content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good day, Juan Mamani. Thank you for considering my property. To begin, may I ask what you are looking for in terms of a rental price for this 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. So, how much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Well, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. That being said, I am willing to be flexible in our negotiations. Based on the current market rates, I am asking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if that is what works best for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to negotiate. Can you provide any discounts or incentives for me?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Juan. In addition to the lower rental price, I am also willing to offer you a discount on the first three months of rent. This brings the total rental cost down to 720 Euros per month for the first three months. Additionally, I am willing to provide you with a security deposit of two months' rent upfront, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you maintain the property in good condition.
name: Heinrich Heine
